Name: Client Health - Client Version 5.00.9096.1000 (ConfigMan 2211)
Query: select SMS_R_SYSTEM.ResourceID,SMS_R_SYSTEM.ResourceType,SMS_R_SYSTEM.Name,SMS_R_SYSTEM.SMSUniqueIdentifier,SMS_R_SYSTEM.ResourceDomainORWorkgroup,SMS_R_SYSTEM.Client from SMS_R_System where SMS_R_System.ClientVersion = '5.00.9096.1000'
Comment: Query for client collections 5.0.9096.1000

Name: Client Health - Duplicate Name
Query: select R.ResourceID,R.ResourceType,R.Name,R.SMSUniqueIdentifier,R.ResourceDomainORWorkgroup,R.Client from SMS_R_System as r   full join SMS_R_System as s1 on s1.ResourceId = r.ResourceId   full join SMS_R_System as s2 on s2.Name = s1.Name where s1.Name = s2.Name and s1.ResourceId != s2.ResourceId
Comment: All systems having a duplicate device record

Name: Client Health - Less than 1GB free disk space on C
Query: select SMS_R_SYSTEM.ResourceID,SMS_R_SYSTEM.ResourceType,SMS_R_SYSTEM.Name,SMS_R_SYSTEM.SMSUniqueIdentifier,SMS_R_SYSTEM.ResourceDomainORWorkgroup,SMS_R_SYSTEM.Client from SMS_R_System inner join SMS_G_System_LOGICAL_DISK on SMS_G_System_LOGICAL_DISK.ResourceID = SMS_R_System.ResourceId where SMS_G_System_LOGICAL_DISK.DeviceID = 'C:' and SMS_G_System_LOGICAL_DISK.FreeSpace <= 1000
Comment: < 1 GB on C

Name: Client Health - No Hardware Scan in 2 weeks
Query: select SMS_R_SYSTEM.ResourceID,SMS_R_SYSTEM.ResourceType,SMS_R_SYSTEM.Name,SMS_R_SYSTEM.SMSUniqueIdentifier,SMS_R_SYSTEM.ResourceDomainORWorkgroup,SMS_R_SYSTEM.Client from SMS_R_System where ResourceId in (select SMS_R_System.ResourceID from SMS_R_System inner join SMS_G_System_WORKSTATION_STATUS on SMS_G_System_WORKSTATION_STATUS.ResourceID = SMS_R_System.ResourceId where DATEDIFF(dd,SMS_G_System_WORKSTATION_STATUS.LastHardwareScan,GetDate()) > 14)
Comment: All devices with CCM client that have not communicated with hardware inventory in over 14 days

Name: Client Health - No Client
Query: select SMS_R_SYSTEM.ResourceID,SMS_R_SYSTEM.ResourceType,SMS_R_SYSTEM.Name,SMS_R_SYSTEM.SMSUniqueIdentifier,SMS_R_SYSTEM.ResourceDomainORWorkgroup,SMS_R_SYSTEM.Client from SMS_R_System where SMS_R_System.Client = 0 OR SMS_R_System.Client is NULL
Comment: All devices without CCM client installed

Name: Client Health - Not Approved
Query: select SMS_R_SYSTEM.ResourceID, SMS_R_SYSTEM.ResourceType, SMS_R_SYSTEM.Name, SMS_R_SYSTEM.SMSUniqueIdentifier, SMS_R_SYSTEM.ResourceDomainORWorkgroup, SMS_R_SYSTEM.Client from SMS_R_System inner join SMS_CM_RES_COLL_SMS00001 on SMS_CM_RES_COLL_SMS00001.ResourceId = SMS_R_System.ResourceId where SMS_CM_RES_COLL_SMS00001.IsApproved= '0'
Comment: All devices not approved

Name: Client Health - BIOS older than 2020
Query: select * from SMS_R_System inner join SMS_G_System_PC_BIOS on SMS_G_System_PC_BIOS.ResourceID = SMS_R_SYSTEM.ResourceID where SMS_G_System_PC_BIOS.ReleaseDate < '01/01/2021 00:00:00'
Comment: Bios older than 2020

Name: Hardware - Laptops
Query: select SMS_R_System.ResourceId, SMS_R_System.ResourceType, SMS_R_System.Name, SMS_R_System.SMSUniqueIdentifier, SMS_R_System.ResourceDomainORWorkgroup, SMS_R_System.Client from SMS_R_System inner join SMS_G_System_SYSTEM_ENCLOSURE on SMS_G_System_SYSTEM_ENCLOSURE.ResourceID = SMS_R_System.ResourceId where SMS_G_System_SYSTEM_ENCLOSURE.ChassisTypes in ('8', '9', '10', '11', '12', '14', '18', '21')
Comment: Query for laptop chasis

Name: Hardware - Dell Laptops
Query: select SMS_R_SYSTEM.ResourceID,SMS_R_SYSTEM.ResourceType,SMS_R_SYSTEM.Name,SMS_R_SYSTEM.SMSUniqueIdentifier,SMS_R_SYSTEM.ResourceDomainORWorkgroup,SMS_R_SYSTEM.Client from SMS_R_System inner join SMS_G_System_COMPUTER_SYSTEM on SMS_G_System_COMPUTER_SYSTEM.ResourceId = SMS_R_System.ResourceId where SMS_G_System_COMPUTER_SYSTEM.Manufacturer like '%Dell%'
Comment: laptops with dell manufacturer

Name: Hardware - HP Laptops
Query: select SMS_R_SYSTEM.ResourceID,SMS_R_SYSTEM.ResourceType,SMS_R_SYSTEM.Name,SMS_R_SYSTEM.SMSUniqueIdentifier,SMS_R_SYSTEM.ResourceDomainORWorkgroup,SMS_R_SYSTEM.Client from SMS_R_System inner join SMS_G_System_COMPUTER_SYSTEM on SMS_G_System_COMPUTER_SYSTEM.ResourceId = SMS_R_System.ResourceId where SMS_G_System_COMPUTER_SYSTEM.Manufacturer like '%HP%' or SMS_G_System_COMPUTER_SYSTEM.Manufacturer like '%Hewlett-Packard%'
Comment: All laptops with HP manufacturer

Name: Hardware - Lenovo Laptops
Query: select SMS_R_SYSTEM.ResourceID,SMS_R_SYSTEM.ResourceType,SMS_R_SYSTEM.Name,SMS_R_SYSTEM.SMSUniqueIdentifier,SMS_R_SYSTEM.ResourceDomainORWorkgroup,SMS_R_SYSTEM.Client from SMS_R_System inner join SMS_G_System_COMPUTER_SYSTEM on SMS_G_System_COMPUTER_SYSTEM.ResourceId = SMS_R_System.ResourceId where SMS_G_System_COMPUTER_SYSTEM.Manufacturer like '%Lenovo%'
Comment: All laptops with Lenovo manufacturer

Name: ConfigMan - ConfigMan Console Installed
Query: select SMS_R_SYSTEM.ResourceID,SMS_R_SYSTEM.ResourceType,SMS_R_SYSTEM.Name,SMS_R_SYSTEM.SMSUniqueIdentifier,SMS_R_SYSTEM.ResourceDomainORWorkgroup,SMS_R_SYSTEM.Client from SMS_R_System inner join SMS_G_System_ADD_REMOVE_PROGRAMS on SMS_G_System_ADD_REMOVE_PROGRAMS.ResourceID = SMS_R_System.ResourceId where SMS_G_System_ADD_REMOVE_PROGRAMS.DisplayName like '%Configuration Manager Console%'
Comment: All systems with SCCM console installed

Name: ConfigMan - Site Servers
Query: select SMS_R_System.ResourceId, SMS_R_System.ResourceType, SMS_R_System.Name, SMS_R_System.SMSUniqueIdentifier, SMS_R_System.ResourceDomainORWorkgroup, SMS_R_System.Client from SMS_R_System where SMS_R_System.SystemRoles = 'SMS Site Server'
Comment: All systems that are SCCM site servers

Name: ConfigMan - Site Systems
Query: select SMS_R_System.ResourceId, SMS_R_System.ResourceType, SMS_R_System.Name, SMS_R_System.SMSUniqueIdentifier, SMS_R_System.ResourceDomainORWorkgroup, SMS_R_System.Client from SMS_R_System where SMS_R_System.SystemRoles = 'SMS Site System' or SMS_R_System.ResourceNames in (Select ServerName FROM SMS_DistributionPointInfo)
Comment: All systems that are SCCM site systems

Name: ConfigMan - Distribution Points
Query: select SMS_R_System.ResourceId, SMS_R_System.ResourceType, SMS_R_System.Name, SMS_R_System.SMSUniqueIdentifier, SMS_R_System.ResourceDomainORWorkgroup, SMS_R_System.Client from SMS_R_System where SMS_R_System.ResourceNames in (Select ServerName FROM SMS_DistributionPointInfo)
Comment: All systems that are SCCM distribution points

Name: Operating Systems - Servers
Query: select SMS_R_SYSTEM.ResourceID,SMS_R_SYSTEM.ResourceType,SMS_R_SYSTEM.Name,SMS_R_SYSTEM.SMSUniqueIdentifier,SMS_R_SYSTEM.ResourceDomainORWorkgroup,SMS_R_SYSTEM.Client from SMS_R_System where OperatingSystemNameandVersion like '%Server%'
Comment: All servers

Name: Operating Systems - Physical Servers
Query: select SMS_R_SYSTEM.ResourceID,SMS_R_SYSTEM.ResourceType,SMS_R_SYSTEM.Name,SMS_R_SYSTEM.SMSUniqueIdentifier,SMS_R_SYSTEM.ResourceDomainORWorkgroup,SMS_R_SYSTEM.Client from SMS_R_System where SMS_R_System.ResourceId not in (select SMS_R_SYSTEM.ResourceID from SMS_R_SYSTEM inner join SMS_G_System_COMPUTER_SYSTEM on SMS_G_System_COMPUTER_SYSTEM.ResourceId = SMS_R_SYSTEM.ResourceId where SMS_R_SYSTEM.IsVirtualMachine = 'True') and SMS_R_SYSTEM.OperatingSystemNameandVersion like 'Microsoft Windows NT%Server%'
Comment: All physical servers

Name: Operating Systems - Domain Controllers
Query: select *  from  SMS_R_System inner join SMS_G_System_COMPUTER_SYSTEM on SMS_G_System_COMPUTER_SYSTEM.ResourceId = SMS_R_System.ResourceId where SMS_G_System_COMPUTER_SYSTEM.Roles like '%Domain_Controller%'
Comment: All Domain Controllers

Name: Operating Systems - Exchange Servers
Query: select *  from  SMS_R_System inner join SMS_G_System_SERVICE on SMS_G_System_SERVICE.ResourceId = SMS_R_System.ResourceId where SMS_G_System_SERVICE.Name like 'Microsoft Exchange Transport %'
Comment: All Exchange Servers

Name: Operating Systems - Virtual Servers
Query: select SMS_R_SYSTEM.ResourceID,SMS_R_SYSTEM.ResourceType,SMS_R_SYSTEM.Name,SMS_R_SYSTEM.SMSUniqueIdentifier,SMS_R_SYSTEM.ResourceDomainORWorkgroup,SMS_R_SYSTEM.Client from SMS_R_System where SMS_R_SYSTEM.IsVirtualMachine = 'True' and SMS_R_SYSTEM.OperatingSystemNameandVersion like 'Microsoft Windows NT%Server%'
Comment: All virtual servers

Name: Operating Systems - Windows Server 2016
Query: select SMS_R_SYSTEM.ResourceID,SMS_R_SYSTEM.ResourceType,SMS_R_SYSTEM.Name,SMS_R_SYSTEM.SMSUniqueIdentifier,SMS_R_SYSTEM.ResourceDomainORWorkgroup,SMS_R_SYSTEM.Client from SMS_R_System inner join SMS_G_System_OPERATING_SYSTEM on SMS_G_System_OPERATING_SYSTEM.ResourceId = SMS_R_SYSTEM.ResourceId where OperatingSystemNameandVersion like '%Server 10%' and SMS_G_System_OPERATING_SYSTEM.BuildNumber = '14393'
Comment: All servers running Windows Server 2016 (End of Support: 2027-01-12)

Name: Operating Systems - Windows Server 2012/2012 R2
Query: select SMS_R_SYSTEM.ResourceID,SMS_R_SYSTEM.ResourceType,SMS_R_SYSTEM.Name,SMS_R_SYSTEM.SMSUniqueIdentifier,SMS_R_SYSTEM.ResourceDomainORWorkgroup,SMS_R_SYSTEM.Client from SMS_R_System where OperatingSystemNameandVersion like '%Server 6.2%' or OperatingSystemNameandVersion like '%Server 6.3%'
Comment: All servers running Windows Server 2012/2012 R2 (End of Support: 2023-10-10)

Name: Operating Systems - Windows Server 2019

Comment: All servers running Windows Server 2019 (End of Support: 2029-01-09)

Name: Operating Systems - Windows Server 2022
Query: select SMS_R_SYSTEM.ResourceID,SMS_R_SYSTEM.ResourceType,SMS_R_SYSTEM.Name,SMS_R_SYSTEM.SMSUniqueIdentifier,SMS_R_SYSTEM.ResourceDomainORWorkgroup,SMS_R_SYSTEM.Client from SMS_R_System inner join SMS_G_System_OPERATING_SYSTEM on SMS_G_System_OPERATING_SYSTEM.ResourceId = SMS_R_SYSTEM.ResourceId where OperatingSystemNameandVersion like '%Server 10%' and SMS_G_System_OPERATING_SYSTEM.BuildNumber = '20348'
Comment: All servers running Windows Server 2022 (End of Support: 2031-10-14)

Name: Operating Systems - Windows Server, version 20H2
Query: select SMS_R_SYSTEM.ResourceID,SMS_R_SYSTEM.ResourceType,SMS_R_SYSTEM.Name,SMS_R_SYSTEM.SMSUniqueIdentifier,SMS_R_SYSTEM.ResourceDomainORWorkgroup,SMS_R_SYSTEM.Client from SMS_R_System where OperatingSystemNameandVersion like '%20H2%'

Query: select SMS_R_System.ResourceId, SMS_R_System.ResourceType, SMS_R_System.Name, SMS_R_System.SMSUniqueIdentifier, SMS_R_System.ResourceDomainORWorkgroup, SMS_R_System.Client from  SMS_R_System inner join SMS_G_System_OFFICE_PRODUCTINFO on SMS_G_System_OFFICE_PRODUCTINFO.ResourceID = SMS_R_System.ResourceId where SMS_G_System_OFFICE_PRODUCTINFO.IsProPlusInstalled = 1
Comment: o365 all channels

Name: Office - 365 Beta Channel
Query: select * from SMS_R_System inner join SMS_G_System_OFFICE365PROPLUSCONFIGURATIONS on SMS_G_System_OFFICE365PROPLUSCONFIGURATIONS.ResourceId = SMS_R_System.ResourceId where SMS_G_System_OFFICE365PROPLUSCONFIGURATIONS.cfgUpdateChannel = 'http://officecdn.microsoft.com/pr/5440fd1f-7ecb-4221-8110-145efaa6372f'
Comment: o365 beta channesl

Name: Office - 365 Current Channel (Preview)
Query: select * from SMS_R_System inner join SMS_G_System_OFFICE365PROPLUSCONFIGURATIONS on SMS_G_System_OFFICE365PROPLUSCONFIGURATIONS.ResourceId = SMS_R_System.ResourceId where SMS_G_System_OFFICE365PROPLUSCONFIGURATIONS.cfgUpdateChannel = 'http://officecdn.microsoft.com/pr/64256afe-f5d9-4f86-8936-8840a6a4f5be'
Comment: o365 current preview channesl

Name: Office - 365 Current Channel
Query: select * from SMS_R_System inner join SMS_G_System_OFFICE365PROPLUSCONFIGURATIONS on SMS_G_System_OFFICE365PROPLUSCONFIGURATIONS.ResourceId = SMS_R_System.ResourceId where SMS_G_System_OFFICE365PROPLUSCONFIGURATIONS.cfgUpdateChannel = 'http://officecdn.microsoft.com/pr/492350f6-3a01-4f97-b9c0-c7c6ddf67d60'
Comment: o365 current channesl

Name: Office - 365 Monthly Enterprise Channel
Query: select * from SMS_R_System inner join SMS_G_System_OFFICE365PROPLUSCONFIGURATIONS on SMS_G_System_OFFICE365PROPLUSCONFIGURATIONS.ResourceId = SMS_R_System.ResourceId where SMS_G_System_OFFICE365PROPLUSCONFIGURATIONS.cfgUpdateChannel = 'http://officecdn.microsoft.com/pr/55336b82-a18d-4dd6-b5f6-9e5095c314a6'
Comment: o365 mon enterprise channesl

Name: Office - 365 Semi-Annual Enterprise Channel (Preview)
Query: select * from SMS_R_System inner join SMS_G_System_OFFICE365PROPLUSCONFIGURATIONS on SMS_G_System_OFFICE365PROPLUSCONFIGURATIONS.ResourceId = SMS_R_System.ResourceId where SMS_G_System_OFFICE365PROPLUSCONFIGURATIONS.cfgUpdateChannel = 'http://officecdn.microsoft.com/pr/b8f9b850-328d-4355-9145-c59439a0c4cf'
Comment: o365 Semi-Annual Enterprise Channel (Preview)

Name: Office - 365 Semi-Annual Enterprise Channel
Query: select * from SMS_R_System inner join SMS_G_System_OFFICE365PROPLUSCONFIGURATIONS on SMS_G_System_OFFICE365PROPLUSCONFIGURATIONS.ResourceId = SMS_R_System.ResourceId where SMS_G_System_OFFICE365PROPLUSCONFIGURATIONS.cfgUpdateChannel = 'http://officecdn.microsoft.com/pr/7ffbc6bf-bc32-4f92-8982-f9dd17fd3114'
Comment: o365 Semi-Annual Enterprise Channel

Name: Client Health - Internet Explorer set as default browser
Query: select * from SMS_R_SYSTEM inner join SMS_G_System_DEFAULT_BROWSER on SMS_G_System_DEFAULT_BROWSER.ResourceID = SMS_G_System.ResourceID where SMS_G_System_DEFAULT_BROWSER.BrowserProgID='IE.HTTP'
Comment: Workstations with internet explorer set as default browser

Name: Client Health - Log Level Verbose
Query: select SMS_G_System_CLIENT_DIAGNOSTICS.DebugLoggingEnabled, SMS_R_System.Name, SMS_G_System_CLIENT_DIAGNOSTICS.LogLevel from  SMS_R_System inner join SMS_G_System_CLIENT_DIAGNOSTICS on SMS_G_System_CLIENT_DIAGNOSTICS.ResourceID = SMS_R_System.ResourceId where SMS_G_System_CLIENT_DIAGNOSTICS.LogLevel = 0
Comment: Systems with verbose ccm logging

Name: Client Health - Log Level Default
Query: select SMS_G_System_CLIENT_DIAGNOSTICS.DebugLoggingEnabled, SMS_R_System.Name, SMS_G_System_CLIENT_DIAGNOSTICS.LogLevel from  SMS_R_System inner join SMS_G_System_CLIENT_DIAGNOSTICS on SMS_G_System_CLIENT_DIAGNOSTICS.ResourceID = SMS_R_System.ResourceId where SMS_G_System_CLIENT_DIAGNOSTICS.LogLevel = 1
Comment: Systems with default ccm logging

Name: Client Health - Log Level Warnings and Errors
Query: select SMS_G_System_CLIENT_DIAGNOSTICS.DebugLoggingEnabled, SMS_R_System.Name, SMS_G_System_CLIENT_DIAGNOSTICS.LogLevel from  SMS_R_System inner join SMS_G_System_CLIENT_DIAGNOSTICS on SMS_G_System_CLIENT_DIAGNOSTICS.ResourceID = SMS_R_System.ResourceId where SMS_G_System_CLIENT_DIAGNOSTICS.LogLevel = 2
Comment: Systems with warning and errors only ccm logging

Name: Client Health - Log Level Errors
Query: select SMS_G_System_CLIENT_DIAGNOSTICS.DebugLoggingEnabled, SMS_R_System.Name, SMS_G_System_CLIENT_DIAGNOSTICS.LogLevel from  SMS_R_System inner join SMS_G_System_CLIENT_DIAGNOSTICS on SMS_G_System_CLIENT_DIAGNOSTICS.ResourceID = SMS_R_System.ResourceId where SMS_G_System_CLIENT_DIAGNOSTICS.LogLevel = 3
Comment: Systems with errors only ccm logging

Name: Operating Systems - Windows 11 21H2 (10.0.22000)
Query: select SMS_R_SYSTEM.ResourceID,SMS_R_SYSTEM.ResourceType,SMS_R_SYSTEM.Name,SMS_R_SYSTEM.SMSUniqueIdentifier,SMS_R_SYSTEM.ResourceDomainORWorkgroup,SMS_R_SYSTEM.Client from SMS_R_System where SMS_R_System.Build = '10.0.22000'
Comment: All workstations with Windows 11 21H2 10.0.22000 (End of Support: Home, October 10,2023)(End of Support: business October 8 2024)

Name: Operating Systems - Windows 11 22H2 (10.0.22621)
Query: select SMS_R_SYSTEM.ResourceID,SMS_R_SYSTEM.ResourceType,SMS_R_SYSTEM.Name,SMS_R_SYSTEM.SMSUniqueIdentifier,SMS_R_SYSTEM.ResourceDomainORWorkgroup,SMS_R_SYSTEM.Client from SMS_R_System where SMS_R_System.Build = '10.0.22621'
Comment: All workstations with Windows 11 22H2 10.0.22621 (End of Support: Home, June 26 2024)(End of Support: business June 24 2025)

Name: Operating Systems - Windows 11 23H2 (10.0.22631)
Query: select SMS_R_SYSTEM.ResourceID,SMS_R_SYSTEM.ResourceType,SMS_R_SYSTEM.Name,SMS_R_SYSTEM.SMSUniqueIdentifier,SMS_R_SYSTEM.ResourceDomainORWorkgroup,SMS_R_SYSTEM.Client from SMS_R_System where SMS_R_System.Build = '10.0.22631'
Comment: All workstations with Windows 11 23H2 10.0.22631 (End of Support: November 11 2025)

Name: Software - Teams Machine-Wide Installer
Query: select SMS_R_SYSTEM.ResourceID,SMS_R_SYSTEM.ResourceType,SMS_R_SYSTEM.Name,SMS_R_SYSTEM.SMSUniqueIdentifier,SMS_R_SYSTEM.ResourceDomainORWorkgroup,SMS_R_SYSTEM.Client from SMS_R_System inner join SMS_G_System_INSTALLED_SOFTWARE on SMS_G_System_INSTALLED_SOFTWARE.ResourceID = SMS_R_System.ResourceId where SMS_G_System_INSTALLED_SOFTWARE.ProductName = 'Teams Machine-Wide Installer'
Comment: Systems with Teams Machine Wide Installer installed. (Classic Teams EOS: July 1 2024)

Name: Software - Visual Studio (2017, 2019, 2022)
Query: select distinct SMS_R_System.ResourceId, SMS_R_System.ResourceType, SMS_R_System.Name, SMS_R_System.SMSUniqueIdentifier, SMS_R_System.ResourceDomainORWorkgroup, SMS_R_System.Client from  SMS_R_System inner join SMS_G_System_ADD_REMOVE_PROGRAMS on SMS_G_System_ADD_REMOVE_PROGRAMS.ResourceID = SMS_R_System.ResourceId where SMS_G_System_ADD_REMOVE_PROGRAMS.DisplayName like 'Visual Studio %[a-z]% 20[1,2][2,7,9]'
Comment: Collection to Target Visual Studio CIs,CBs, and Software Updates

Name: Office - Microsoft Office Professional 2013
Query: select distinct SMS_R_System.ResourceId, SMS_R_System.ResourceType, SMS_R_System.Name, SMS_R_System.SMSUniqueIdentifier, SMS_R_System.ResourceDomainORWorkgroup, SMS_R_System.Client from  SMS_R_System inner join SMS_G_System_ADD_REMOVE_PROGRAMS on SMS_G_System_ADD_REMOVE_PROGRAMS.ResourceID = SMS_R_System.ResourceId where SMS_G_System_ADD_REMOVE_PROGRAMS.DisplayName like '%Microsoft Office Professional%2013%'
Comment: Systems with Office 2013 found. EOS: April 11 2023

Name: Office - Microsoft Office Professional 2016
Query: select SMS_R_SYSTEM.ResourceID,SMS_R_SYSTEM.ResourceType,SMS_R_SYSTEM.Name,SMS_R_SYSTEM.SMSUniqueIdentifier,SMS_R_SYSTEM.ResourceDomainORWorkgroup,SMS_R_SYSTEM.Client from SMS_R_System inner join SMS_G_System_INSTALLED_SOFTWARE on SMS_G_System_INSTALLED_SOFTWARE.ResourceId = SMS_R_System.ResourceId where SMS_G_System_INSTALLED_SOFTWARE.ProductName = 'Microsoft Office Professional Plus 2016'
Comment: Systems with Office 2016. EOS: October 14 2025
